name: Idle GYM Sports
description:
Manage your gym and let more and more people become healthy!

Utilize the money to expand your gym and share the fitness spirit all over the world!

Get started in a small gym and treat customers with your heart to make the business grow. Build new gyms and expand the premises to include more fitness activities.

Game Feature:
• Realistic simulation of the gym environment
• Get idle money, even when you offline
• Expand your Gym to build more and earn more
• Smooth and easy gameplay
• Various achievement to complete
• Picturesque game scenes and 3D graphics
